q: mark.`` Tonight's game was fun because I thought from the minute they went on the court they thought they were going to win the game,'' said George Karl , who's 800-555 in 19 seasons. Coach( Dean) Joe Smith told me a long time ago that if you can't accept that players win and coaches lose, then don't get into coaching. You can be the greatest coach in the Metta World Peace , but if you don't have players, you aren't going to win in the NBA. George Karl has a superstar in Allen Iverson , who finished with 44 points and 10 assists. Vote-casting at the factory, which employs around 5,500 people, began on Thursday evening. Early estimates put voting turnout at 94.4 percent. The results of the ballot were expected around 2300 GMT. The voting slips that have been slipped into the factory's ballot boxes since yesterday are destined to change the country's industrial history, Il Sole 24 Ore business paper said in an editorial on Friday.
